suggest.spryker/calculation: If you want to use Calculation plugins you need to install spryker/calculation.
suggest.spryker/cart: If you want to use Cart plugins you need to install spryker/cart.
suggest.spryker/checkout: If you want to use Checkout plugins you need to install spryker/checkout.
suggest.spryker/oms: If you want to use Oms plugins you need to install spryker/oms.
suggest.spryker/sales-aggregator: If you want to use SalesAggregator plugins you need to install spryker/sales-aggregator.
